title: A New Milestone For Orlando
text: A New Milestone For Orlando United Kingdom, London, 23 September 2015 -- Orlando has always been at the top on the wish-list of travelers. However, recently it has been officially acknowledged in its popularity among global tourists.International Tourism in Orlando has shown continuous growth over the past few years. In 2014, the number of visitors to this place was over 62 million. This is nearly a 5 percent increase in the number of visitors from the year 2013 and has set up a new milestone for the US travel industry. Visit Orlando, the official tourism association of the city, made this recent announcement. In this consequence, nearly 32 million room nights were sold in 2014 which accounted to huge bed tax collections of nearly $200 million for the Orange County; this is yet another record. Officials gave credit for this tourism boom to the development and expansions of the theme parks that serve as the major attraction of the city. Passing the 60 million annual visitors mark is indeed an enviable achievement and the travel department is confident enough that Orlando is well placed on the global map to continue to set more such records in the coming years. With these figures in hand, it has been established that Orlando is the most popular destination of the United States. People from different parts of the globe board their cheap flights to Orlando and come to experience the existing wonders of the city along with the new ones that keep adding to its charm. According to George Aguel, the President and CEO of Visit Orlando, "This historic milestone is the latest testament to Orlando's leadership in tourism. It's a tribute to the steadfast commitment and continued investment by our tourism community, the special brand of service that greets our visitors and the global marketing and sales efforts of our Visit Orlando team and member companies.‚Äù In order to meet the increasing needs and preferences of the tourists, the economy has started making adequate investments in infrastructure and in the renovation and maintenance of the existing parks and structures. Another feather Orlando has also backed the number 1 position in the list of top summer holiday destinations for British tourists. The second position goes to New York. Out of the 10 most popular destinations, 5 are in the US. It appears that the urge to rediscover the joys of carefree moments is pushing travelers towards the Walt Disney World of Orlando. Impact of tourism Tourism has had a remarkably positive impact on the economy of Orlando. In fact, it is this industry that is responsible for maximum job creations and effective income generation. The hospitality sector has not just pleased travelers from the world over but has also provided a better standard of life to the residents and employees of Orlando. About Orlando Orlando is the place where dreams from the fairy tale world seem to come true. Besides its theme parks, the city also stands out in luxurious resorts, shopping complexes, lush green golf courses and some really appealing dining opportunities. In recent years, the city has diversified itself to a great extent. It has always remained ahead in exploring new avenues for visitors. This is one of the many reasons that have accentuated its popularity, thereby attracting a wide range of tourists. Luxury travelers, foodies, adventurists, art lovers, families, all comprise of its flock of visitors. They book their cheap air tickets to Orlando from UK to experience several exciting attractions of the city. Best time to visit The months of January to April are the most suitable time of the year to visit Orlando. The weather is pleasant during these months. Cheap flights to Orlando from UK are available if booked in advance. The summer months are the worst. Hotel prices are high during this time as hotels take advantage of school breaks. ###
